description: Ukyou is the spoiled son of the local magistrate, http://anidb.net/ch3952 [Ayamaro]. His daily existence consists of eating the finest food, sleeping in the most comfortable castle in town, and romancing his cadre of willing young female partners. He is used to getting things his way. His father wishes he would get his head into business, but Ukyou resists, preferring a life of leisure to one of work. Upon seeing http://anidb.net/ch3961 [Kirara] he vows to take her into his harem.
name: Ukyou
